articles/installation.html.title: Installation
articles/installation.html.keywords: Installation Recommended way to install SixModLoader is using SixModLoader.Launcher . Install .NET Core 3.1+ or not recommended Mono Download launcher from release page (recommended .net core linux or win , or net472 for mono/windows only, but only if you have to) Extract launcher executable from zip to server directory Just run SixModLoader[.exe] launch "LocalAdmin[.exe] 7777" and it will download/update SixModLoader, configure Doorstop and launch SCP:SL with mod loader injected! TIP for people using hosting providers, if your provider allows replacing LocalAdmin/MultiAdmin, you can replace it with launcher and write your arguments in jumploader.txt Manual installation is a bit more complicated. Extract SixModLoader zip to zip to server directory Download Doorstop ( Unix or Windows ) Configure Doorstop to load SixModLoader/bin/SixModLoader.dll Launch and you should be done but without auto updates :(

articles/migration-guide.html.title: Migrating from Exiled 2.0
articles/migration-guide.html.keywords: Migrating from Exiled 2.0 Make sure to have unmodified game files (especially Assembly-CSharp.dll ), run game update with validate option Clear all current Exiled dlls Install SixModLoader Download SixModLoader.Compatibility.dll and drop it into SixModLoader/mods Run server once so it will download Exiled and create default config.yml Move Exiled config to SixModLoader/mods/Exiled/config.yml

articles/why.html.title: Why SixModLoader?
articles/why.html.keywords: Why SixModLoader? Because there are no alternatives.

index.html.title: SixModLoader
